root: ^I have loads of homework and my mother asks me to go to the grocery store with her to help her shop.
^Tell her I have homework and stay home to do my homework.
^Tell her I have homework but go hang out with my friend %FirstName:NPC:2%
^Tell her I want to hang out with my friend %FirstName:NPC:2%

res1: ^We go to the store and have a good time talking and shopping and I also find $50 in the parking lot!
^My mother and I had a great time at the store together, talking and sharing stories, I even found $50! But I completely forgot about my homework and my grades were affected.
res2: ^My mother understands and I stay home and finish my homework. However, I forget to eat and faint.
^My mother was happy I was being responsible and I managed to finish all of my homework and learned a ton! Forgot to eat though, fainted in the bathroom and hit my head!
res3: ^I play video games with %FirstName:NPC:2% at his place and when my mother comes home and I’m not there, she grounds me.
^%FirstName:NPC:2% and I had a blast doing nothing but playing video games. Might be the last time I get out of the house in awhile since my mother grounded me for lying.
res4: ^My mother tells me if I stay home I have to do my homework. I stay home and do most of my homework but spend a lot of time eating snacks and watching TV.
^My mother was mad and made me stay home and do homework. I did most of it but decided I needed to unwind with snacks and TV too. Not that I told her that, but it turned out pretty great!
